name: LAB (Bot Studio)
description:
LAB is a short demo made using GB Studio! You will explore your city, do quests, and defeat Team Slash! This is just a short demo, so the game is very short. If you do have the ability to donate a $1 (or a bit more), please do. Donating can help me produce more games using GB Studio and Unity to make games PC, mobile, and console platforms! 

Thank You!
